cachePut

public final void cachePut(String key,
                           Object value)
Store in Infinispan. This method supports null values. This method is used by the code generated in the Domain Objects.

cacheGet

public final <T> T cacheGet(String key)
Reads from Infinispan a value with a given key. This method is used by the code generated in the Domain Objects.

getInfinispanCache

@Deprecated
public final org.infinispan.Cache getInfinispanCache()
Deprecated. 

WARNING: This is a backend-specific method. It was added as an hack to enable some tests by Algorithmica and will be removed later. The programmer should not use this method directly, because by doing so the code becomes backend-dependent.
